EmailTemplate.subject: Security O365 Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Understand your Security Exposures with Office 365 Best Practices for Securing O365: Email, Users, Data and Apps
Have you migrated to O365? Are you in the middle of moving to O365? Are you planning to move in the near future? If you answered “Yes” to any of these questions, you should understand your security exposure! Migrating to the cloud gives you more flexibility but many do not understand the potential risk when adopting Office 365 applications like Exchange Online, SharePoint and OneDrive. It is imperative to deploy effective security to protect your users - their accounts and email - and your organization’s sensitive data.
Join our partners CompuCom and Cisco to learn more about: • Security risks of Office 365 • Best practices for securing Office 365 • Secure your email • Threat protection, securing users • Data protection, preventing data loss • Learn how you can evaluate your security control efficiency using the threat analyzer.
Speakers: • Fred Ibrahimsha, CompuCom Security Architect • Greg Barnes, Cisco Security Solutions Architect
Dates and Times: • Wednesday May 22nd @ 11 AM EST
Click the registration button below to secure your spot today! Register Now <[[https://www.cvent.com/events/understand-your-security-exposures-with-office-365-best-practices-for-securing-o365-email-users-data/registration-cba6effdd36a4fefae93551423b9c9a2.aspx?fqp=true]]> Attend and have a chance to win a Google Home.
